casebody.data:
PEREZ
v.
AMERICAN AIRLINES, et al. No. 661PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Joy H. Brewer, Cary, Kimberly A. D'Arruda, for American Airlines, et al. Samuel A. Scudder, Raleigh, for Lori Perez. Joe A. Austin, Jr., Jennifer T. Gottsegen, Raleigh, for NC Asso. Defense Attorneys. Bruce A. Hamilton, Julia S. Hooten, Raleigh, for NCBBI.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of August 2006 by Plaintiff for Court to Reconsider Order of Amicus Curiae:

*810"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
